name: table

query.description: Name of the cfquery from which to draw data.

border.description: Adds a border to the table. Use only when you specify the HTMLTable attribute for the table.

colspacing.description: Number of spaces to insert between columns 'default is 2'.

colheaders.description: Displays headers for each column, as specified in the cfcol tag.

startrow.description: Specifies the query row from which to start processing.

maxrows.description: Maximum number of rows to display in the table.

htmltable.description: Renders the table as an HTML 3.0 table.

headerlines.description:
Number of lines to use for the table header. The default is 2, which leaves one line between
		the headers and the first row of the table.

description:
Builds a table in a CFML page. Use the cfcol tag to define table column and row
  characteristics. The cftable tag renders data either as preformatted text, or, with the HTMLTable
  attribute, as an HTML table. Use cftable to create tables if you don't want to write HTML table tag
  code, or if your data can be well presented as preformatted text.
